title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 10050.1 - Availability of public records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 10050.1 - Availability of public records

State Regulations
(a) The public records of the Long Island

Power Authority (the "Authority", or "LIPA") shall be available in accordance
with this Part for inspection and copying upon written or oral request, reasonably describing the record or records sought, during the times provided
in this Part at the Authority's main office at 333 Earle Ovington Blvd., Suite
403, Uniondale, NY 11553. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
10050.1

Amended

New

York State Register August 24, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 34, eff. 8/24/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
